lenstronomy.Analysis.lens_properties module¶

class lenstronomy.Analysis.lens_properties.LensProp(z_lens, z_source, kwargs_options, kwargs_data)[source]¶

Bases: object

this class contains routines to compute time delays, magnification ratios, line of sight velocity dispersions etc for a given lens model

angular_diameter_relations(sigma_v_model, sigma_v, kappa_ext, D_dt_model, z_d)[source]¶
Returns:
angular_distances(sigma_v_measured, time_delay_measured, kappa_ext, sigma_v_modeled, fermat_pot)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • sigma_v_measured – velocity dispersion measured [km/s]
  • time_delay_measured – time delay measured [d]
  • kappa_ext – external convergence estimated []
  • sigma_v_modeled – lens model velocity dispersion with default cosmology and without external convergence [km/s]
  • fermat_pot – fermat potential of lens model, modulo MSD of kappa_ext [arcsec^2]
Returns:

D_d and D_d*D_s/D_ds, units in Mpc physical
